entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
